name: Greedy Gus
slogan: Extracting Wealth, One Block at a Time
response: Greedy Gus is your classic extraction-obsessed troll. This guy lives for the drill, loves the refine, and thinks black gold should flow like rivers of chocolate—except it’s oil, not candy. The land? Just another milkshake to suck dry. For Gus, insurance exists, pharma exists… yawn. He doesn’t even roll his eyes; just a lazy shrug and a 'meh' scratch behind his ear. But when it comes to crypto, oh boy! If he weren’t such a mossy, grimy troll, he’d write love letters in dripping ink. Crypto is his religion, his destiny, his greasy treasure chest of digital gold. Sure, he doesn’t have a pulse on the environment or much else—but hey, at least he’s consistent… in his greed!
